Title: Dawn-and-Dusk
Description:
Two cats of questionable provenance wrought into one exceptional pet, set aside any questions you may have and really think about how much cat that is.

Also features a 'Cat Herder' preset, which is just a Watervine Farmer with some catty flair.

Made for the 'Caves of Qud Modding Jam: Pets & Presets' jam, but uploaded separately in the event that I'd like to do an absurd amount of work on them in the future.

[b]Additional functionality spoiler:[/b] [spoiler]You may want to bring them along with the 'Telepathy' mutation.[/spoiler]

[h2][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3229001431]You may also be interested in my, much larger, pet mod named 'Tzuso'.[/url][/h2]
